definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: The rider pulled his horsed up short.
sentences.chinese: 騎手突然一下把馬勒住。

sentences.english: Its orchestration is similar to that of Mahler's.
sentences.chinese: 其編曲方式與馬勒相似。

sentences.english: Vineyards are located in the cool pre-cordillera areas of Curico Valley and Maule Valley.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄園位於克里庫山谷和馬勒山谷較寒冷的山地。

sentences.english: 'Melissa Boyle Mahle,' she says, extending her hand.
sentences.chinese: “梅麗莎波義耳馬勒，”她說，並且伸出手來握手。

sentences.english: All established manufacturers of combustion engines are customers of MAHLE.
sentences.chinese: 所有現有的內燃發動機製造商都是馬勒的用戶。

sentences.english: I would like to recognize Dr Mahler in the audience as one of my predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 我要承認在坐的馬勒博士即是我的前輩之一。

sentences.english: Was Mahle's life really like that?
sentences.chinese: 馬勒的生活真的就像那樣嗎？

sentences.english: Its richness of orchestration lies between Beethoven and Mahler.
sentences.chinese: 其豐富的管絃樂編曲橫亙於貝多芬和馬勒之間。

sentences.english: 'I was very impressed when I met Angelina,' says Mahle.
sentences.chinese: “當我遇見安吉麗娜時，非常驚訝，”馬勒說。

sentences.english: What was this duple vision of Mahler's?
sentences.chinese: 還是回到“陰”與“陽”。馬勒的雙重影像是什麼？

sentences.english: I am sure Dr Mahler would agree.
sentences.chinese: 我相信馬勒博士會同意。

definition: Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
March of the Volunteer Army (PRC National Anthem)
pinyin: Yi4 yong3 jun1 Jin4 xing2 qu3

definition: Shelley/abbr. for 珀西·比希·雪萊|珀西·比希·雪莱[Po4 xi1 · Bi3 xi1 · Xue3 lai2]
A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens 查爾斯·狄更斯|查尔斯·狄更斯[Cha2 er3 si1 · Di2 geng1 si1]
